description.value: This operation provides support for ongoing maintenance of a client-side closure table based on server-side terminological logic. For details of how this is used, see [Maintaining a Closure Table](terminology-service.html#closure)

documentation.value: The name that defines the particular context for the subsumption based closure table
Concepts to add to the closure table
A request to resynchronise - request to send all new entries since the nominated version was sent by the server

A list of new entries (code / system --> code/system) that the client should add to its closure table. The only kind of entry mapping equivalences that can be returned are equal, narrower, wider, and unmatched
